homePage.tagline: I build fast, beautiful web apps. I am dedicated to crafting innovative solutions and continuously learning in the evolving tech landscape. Here’s my work!
homePage.bio: I am currently pursuing a B.Tech in Computer Science. I thrive on building real stuff that works, from full-stack web apps to AI Interfaces. Whether it's solving technical puzzles, designing for humans, or digging through data, I'm all in. I’m here to contribute to teams that build great products.

experience.title: Software Engineering Intern
experience.description: Contributed to the development of a new client portal using Angular and Spring Boot, enhancing front-end performance and user experience.

experience.title: Teaching Assistant
experience.description: Assisted professors in teaching foundational programming concepts in Python to over 100 students, leading lab sessions and grading assignments.

education.description: Relevant Coursework: Data Structures & Algorithms, Web Development (Full Stack), Operating Systems, Artificial Intelligence.

projectsPage.title: My Projects
projectsPage.subtitle: A collection of my work, from full-stack web applications and robust desktop tools to interactive front-end experiments. Each project reflects my commitment to clean code, thoughtful design, and practical problem-solving.

allProjects.title: Offline Reddit
allProjects.description: A full-featured, cross-platform desktop app for downloading Reddit content. Users can save subreddits, posts, and media for offline viewing, with a focus on a clean UI and efficient backend processing.

allProjects.title: Retro BrowserOS
allProjects.description: An interactive web dashboard mimicking a retro-style operating system. This project showcases dynamic UI elements, creative frontend development, and a passion for nostalgic design using modern web technologies.

allProjects.title: Data Visualization Dashboard
allProjects.description: A web-based platform for visualizing complex datasets. Features a RESTful API backend to serve data and a React frontend with D3.js to render interactive charts and graphs, helping users derive insights from raw data.

skillsPage.title: My Toolkit
skillsPage.subtitle: I believe in using the right tool for the job. Here's a look at the languages, frameworks, and technologies I work with to build efficient, scalable, and beautiful applications.
